prompt: Design an app lock screen with a dark grey background and a centered layout. Display a lock icon (Icons.lock) at the top, sized at 80 pixels with a silver color (Colors.grey[400]). Below, show the title 'App Protection' in bold 28px white text, followed by a subtitle 'Enter PIN to access' in 16px light grey text with 10px spacing. Create a 4-digit PIN input section with 4 circular containers (60x60 pixels) with silver borders, arranged horizontally with 10px spacing. Each container shows an empty circle or a filled silver circle for entered digits. Below, include a 3x4 grid keypad with numbers 1-9, 0, and a delete button. Keypad buttons are 70x70 pixels, circular with a black background and silver text, with a subtle border. Use 30px spacing between elements and wrap the layout in a Column with MainAxisAlignment.center and 20px padding.
